languages.text: Один из когитаторов содрогается, издает пронзительный скрежет, вспухает — и взрывается, обдавая ближайших офицеров градом раскаленных осколков. Воксы закатываются гадким механическим звуком, похожим на безумный смех. Вокс фиксирует металлический лязг, с которым падают на пол сервочерепа-гонцы с подготовленными приказами. Из-за кадра доносится крик — искаженные приказы пробились во внутреннюю вокс-систему корабля и уже доставлены в отсеки!

traits.locale_text: Один из когитаторов содрогается, издает пронзительный скрежет, вспухает — и взрывается, обдавая ближайших офицеров градом раскаленных осколков. Воксы закатываются гадким механическим звуком, похожим на безумный смех. Вокс фиксирует металлический лязг, с которым падают на пол сервочерепа-гонцы с подготовленными приказами. Из-за кадра доносится крик — искаженные приказы пробились во внутреннюю вокс-систему корабля и уже доставлены в отсеки!

languages.text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!
languages.original_text: Один из когитаторов содрогается, издает пронзительный скрежет, вспухает — и взрывается, обдавая ближайших офицеров градом раскаленных осколков. Воксы закатываются гадким механическим звуком, похожим на безумный смех. Вокс фиксирует металлический лязг, с которым падают на пол сервочерепа-гонцы с подготовленными приказами. Из-за кадра доносится крик — искаженные приказы пробились во внутреннюю вокс-систему корабля и уже доставлены в отсеки!

traits.locale_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound that resembles mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the frame, a shout comes in — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the modules!

One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound that resembles mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the frame, a shout comes in — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the modules!

One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the modules!

One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the modules!

One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

languages.text: Uno de los cogitadores se sacude, emite un grito penetrante, se hincha... y explota, cubriendo a los oficiales cercanos de esquirlas al rojo vivo. Los vocos emiten un perturbador sonido mecánico que parece una carcajada demente. Se oyen una serie de golpes metálicos y los servocráneos que llevaban las órdenes preparadas caen al suelo. Se oye la voz de alguien que no sale en el grabaimágenes: ¡las órdenes distorsionadas han entrado al sistema de voco interno y han llegado a los compartimentos!
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

traits.locale_text: Uno de los cogitadores se sacude, emite un grito penetrante, se hincha... y explota, cubriendo a los oficiales cercanos de esquirlas al rojo vivo. Los vocos emiten un perturbador sonido mecánico que parece una carcajada demente. Se oyen una serie de golpes metálicos y los servocráneos que llevaban las órdenes preparadas caen al suelo. Se oye la voz de alguien que no sale en el grabaimágenes: ¡las órdenes distorsionadas han entrado al sistema de voco interno y han llegado a los módulos!

languages.text: 其中一台沉思者震动了一下，发出了刺耳的声音，之后膨胀、爆炸。炽热的碎片飞溅到了附近军官们的身上。通讯器发出了令人不安的机械声，仿佛疯子在咯咯笑一样。负责传达命令的伺服头骨信使猛地砸在了地板上，通讯器中传来了一连串金属撞击的声音。视讯记录的画面外传来一声惊呼——被篡改的命令已经侵入了舰船内部的音阵系统，而且已经被传达到了各个区域！
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

traits.locale_text: 其中一个思考器震动了一下，发出了刺耳的声音，之后膨胀、爆炸。炽热的碎片飞溅到了附近军官们的身上。通讯器发出了令人不安的机械声，仿佛疯子在咯咯笑一样。负责传达命令的伺服头骨信使猛地砸在了地板上，通讯器中传来了一连串金属撞击的声音。视讯记录的画面外传来一声惊呼——被篡改的命令已经侵入了舰船内部的音阵系统，而且已经被传达到了各个区域！

languages.text: 1台の考算機が機体を震わせて鋭い金切り声を上げた。機体は膨らんで爆発し、近くの士官に灼熱の破片の雨を降らせる。ヴォクスが狂った笑い声のような不気味な機械音をあげる。用意した命令を運ぶサーヴォスカルメッセンジャーが床に急降下すると、ヴォクスは一連の流れる金属音を拾った。映像フレームの向こうから、叫び声が聞こえた。歪んだ命令は内部のヴォクスシステムに入り込み、すでに区画へ届けられてしまっている！
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

traits.locale_text: 1台の考算機が機体を震わせて鋭い金切り声を上げた。機体は膨らんで爆発し、近くの士官に灼熱の破片の雨を降らせる。ヴォクスが狂った笑い声のような不気味な機械音をあげる。用意した命令を運ぶサーヴォスカルメッセンジャーが床に急降下すると、ヴォクスは一連の流れる金属音を拾った。映像フレームの向こうから、叫び声が聞こえた。歪んだ命令は内部のヴォクスシステムに入り込み、すでに区画へ届けられてしまっている！

languages.text: Einer der Cogitatoren zuckt zusammen, kreischt durchdringend, schwillt an – und explodiert. Ein Hagel glühend heißer Splitter geht auf die Offiziere in der Nähe nieder. Die Vox-Geräte geben ein unangenehmes mechanisches Geräusch von sich, das an ein irres Kichern erinnert. Das Vox nimmt eine Reihe metallischer Klänge auf, als Servoschädel-Boten mit vorbereiteten Befehlen zu Boden fallen. Außerhalb des Vid-Ausschnitts ertönt ein Schrei – die gestörten Befehle haben ihren Weg in das interne Voxsystem gefunden und sind somit bereits an die Abteilungen ausgeliefert!
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

languages.text: L'un des cogitateurs tressaille, émet un sifflement perçant et gonfle... puis explose dans une pluie d'éclats brûlants qui retombent sur les officiers à proximité. Un son mécanique perturbant qui ressemble à un rire dément s'échappe des émetteurs-vox, puis les servocrânes messagers transportant les ordres s'écrasent au sol simultanément dans un fracas métallique. En dehors du champ de vision de l'enregistreur, un cri retentit : les ordres altérés ont atteint le système-vox interne et ont déjà été transmis aux compartiments !
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

traits.locale_text: L'un des cogitateurs tressaille, émet un sifflement perçant et gonfle... puis explose dans une pluie d'éclat brûlants qui retombent sur les officiers à proximité. Un son mécanique perturbant qui ressemble à un rire dément s'échappe des émetteurs-vox, puis les servocrânes messagers transportant les ordres s'écrasent au sol simultanément dans un fracas métallique. En dehors du champ de vision de l'enregistreur, un cri retentit: les ordres altérés ont atteint le système-vox interne et ont déjà été transmis aux modules !

languages.text: Kavramsayarlardan biri sarsılıyor, delici bir çığlık atıyor, şişiyor ve patlayarak yakındaki subayları kızgın parçalara boğuyor. Vokslar, çılgın kıkırdamalar gibi sinir bozucu bir mekanik ses üretiyor. Hazırlanmış emirleri taşıyan haberci hizmeletler yere düşerken vokstan bir dizi metalik çınlama geliyor. Foto çerçevesinin dışından bir çığlık duyuluyor. Çarpık emirler, çoktan dâhili voks sistemine girmiş, bölmelere teslim edilmiş!
languages.original_text: One of the cogitators jolts, lets out a piercing screech, swells up — and explodes, peppering the nearby officers with a hail of white-hot shards. The voxes produce an unnerving mechanical sound like mad cackling. The vox picks up a series of metallic clangs as servo-skull messengers carrying prepared orders plummet to the floor. From beyond the pict frame, a shout comes — the distorted orders made it into the internal vox-system and have already been delivered to the compartments!

traits.locale_text: Kavramsayarlardan biri sarsılıyor, delici bir çığlık atıyor, şişiyor ve patlayarak yakındaki subayları kızgın parçalara boğuyor. Vokslar, çılgın kıkırdamalar gibi sinir bozucu bir mekanik ses üretiyor. Hazırlanmış emirleri taşıyan haberci hizmeletler yere düşerken vokstan bir dizi metalik çınlama geliyor. Foto çerçevesinin dışından bir çığlık duyuluyor. Çarpık emirler, çoktan dâhili voks sistemine girmiş, bölmelere teslim edilmiş!
